<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Record DWARF file directives for later output.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// According to PTX ISA, CUDA Toolkit documentation, 11.5.3. Debugging</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Directives: .file</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/index.html#debugging-directives-file),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The .file directive is allowed only in the outermost scope, i.e., at the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// same level as kernel and device function declarations. Also, the order of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the .loc and .file directive does not matter, .file directives may follow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the .loc directives where the file is referenced.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// LLVM emits .file directives immediately the location debug info is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// emitted, i.e. they may be emitted inside functions. We gather all these</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// directives and emit them outside of the sections and, thus, outside of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// functions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxtargetstreamer/#a198691ea70afd22bfeb5e0830923beba">emitDwarfFileDirective</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">override</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxtargetstreamer/#ab7ccb3b4d754b7e2ab62aca1113ab56d">changeSection</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;CurSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;Section,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">                     uint32&#95;t SubSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">override</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emit the bytes in \\p Data into the output.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is used to emit bytes in \\p Data as sequence of .byte directives.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxtargetstreamer/#a89b1d9f2451a16b36cb2ae1a3e335433">emitRawBytes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">override</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Makes sure that labels are mangled the same way as the actual symbols.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxtargetstreamer/#ad3e4f5bb59058be7d568e2505d04b830">emitValue</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">override</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
